p: Acute toxicity of the essential oil and its main constituents (thymol, carvacrol, œÅ-cymene, and myristicin (purity range from 95-99.5%) purchased from Sigma-Aldrich, USA) were evaluated through topical and fumigant tests against cabbage loopers ( Trichoplusia ni) according to Tak et al. 2016 method ( 20).
